EmailTemplate.description: SFDC1-4713: Customer Care - Case Close - Auto-Response
EmailTemplate.name: Customer Care Case Close
EmailTemplate.subject: IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CUSTOMER CARE
Your IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Closed
{!Today()}
Dear IHS Markit Customer,
The IHS Markit Customer Care Team has completed and closed case reference number {!Case.CaseNumber} with the subject "{!Case.Subject}".
If you feel your request is not yet resolved and/or you have any further questions, please quote the above reference number when contacting us.
Please click here to provide your feedback on your support experience.
Kind regards, IHS Markit Customer Care
{!Case.Thread_Id}
